CrestfallenHome.CrestfallenMage:
The Great Book of ECMAScript has been captured.
All I have left is this tattered page...

CrestfallenHome.CrestfallenMage.msg:
It is said that a wizard in the north can release the book.
If only I could decipher these runes, I could reach her...
Perhaps you can try?

CrestfallenHome.CrestfallenMage: No, no that won't do. You'll have to try again.

Yes. Yes, that's it! I think you've done it!
Now, go outside and give it a try.
Any luck getting past those stumps?

You've freed the Great Book!
Oh Hero, a great journey awaits you.
It is said the Great book can open many doors.
Go east!
